evidence.claim: Novex Wound utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalable hosting solutions.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations in their data handling practices, ensuring patient information security.
Novex Wound employs FHIR standards for health data exchange, facilitating interoperability.
EDI and X12 transaction sets are mentioned for insurance and billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant X12 or EDI use cases found on public pages.
